form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: RECORD OF ALIEN APPREHENDED OR LOCATED, 3-168

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 RECORD OF ILLEGAL ALIEN APPREHENDED OR LOCATED (See A.M. - 2790.31-.34 for Instructions) Family Name (Capital Letters) Given Name Middle Name Sex Hair Eyes Complexion WONG, Ramon Fong Song Male Blk Brn yellow Country of Citizenship Passport Number and Country of Issue File Number Height Weight Occupation China A17 984 698 cook United States Address (Residence) (Number) (Street) (City) (State) Scars or Marks 855 Cleveland Street, Room 21, Los Angeles, Calif Airline & Flight No. or Vessel of Arrival Passenger Boarded At F.B.I. No. Marital Status Single Married 4/2/68 CAL P-6 Perm. Res o Separated Divorced Number, Street, City, Provinco (State) and Country of Permanent Residence Method of Location Mexicali BC Mexico Investigations exp other Birthdate Date of Action Location Code Status at Entry Status When Found 3/3/12 12-10-68 LOS Immigrant Industry City, Province (State) and Country of Birth AR Form: (Type & No.) Length of Time Illegally in U.S. Date & Hour Lifted App./Located Hoy San, Canton, China Not Lifted 6 mo - year Visa Issued At Social Security Account Name Apprehended/Located (At/Near) Tijuana BC Mexico RAMON WONG FONG SONG Los Angeles Date Visa Issued Social Security No. Send C.O. Rec. Check Apprehended/Located By To: 3/25/68 88 1221 Guio Immigration Record Criminal Record None known None known Name, Address, and Nationality of Spouse (Maiden Name, if appropriate) Number & Nationality of Minor Children WONG, Yuk Lin Chan Mexico Hong Kong Father's Name, and Nationality and Address, if Known Mother's Present and Maiden Names, Nationality. and Address, If Known Property in U.S. Not in Immediate Possession Fingerprinted Lookout Book Checked Deportation Charge(s) (Codo Words) None Claimed See Form 1-43 Yes No Not Listed Listed, Code RAZEZ REGOJ WEBAK Name and Address of (Last) (Current) U.S. Employer From: To: Narrative (Outline particulars under which alien located/apprehended and furnish details re time, place and manner of last entry) SUBJECT entered the U.S. as P-6 immigrant. Petitioner and signer of form ES 575 was Mr. LOO, Tong-Hay, owner of the HOLLY cafe at 452 Main Street, El Centro, California. After entry SUBJECT did not report for employment to that cafe. Has accepted employment for approx. 6 -- 8 days with the FAR EAST TERRACE resturant at 4123 Lankershim in No. Hollywood Was hired there as Cooks helper in May or June of 1968 and SUBJECT quit that employment after xx 6 to 8 days of such employment. SUBJECT has submitted form I-130 in the name of his wife for issuance of an immigrant visa. Her file A18 435 377 WONG, Yuk Lin Chan 523(a) If space insufficient, show "continued" and continue on reverse, from bottom up): (Signature and Title) DISTRIBUTION Received (subject and documents) (report of interview) from 1 - file Officer: 1 - Stats 19 at ( 1.
